input_text:
Job Title: Marketing Manager

Location: Denver Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
A Denver-based agency is currently in search of a dynamic Marketing Manager to join our team. In this pivotal role, you will spearhead the development and execution of strategic marketing campaigns aimed at driving significant behavior change. Your responsibilities will encompass overseeing project coordination across diverse client portfolios, requiring strong communication skills for seamless collaboration with both our internal team and clients. We seek a resourceful problem-solver with a knack for innovative thinking. If you're deeply passionate about marketing and thrive in a fast-paced environment, we welcome you to apply and become a valued member of our team!Why us? We are committed to leveraging marketing strategies to drive positive change and amplify the voices of organizations dedicated to social causes. As a Marketing Manager with us, you'll have the chance to lead impactful campaigns and contribute to meaningful projects that actually make a difference in our community.
Duties:Project managementDaily client communicationsWorking with internal teams to ensure client projects are on time/budgetMultitasking among different clients/industries/projectsManaging budgetsDeveloping progress reportsHelp develop proposals for potential clientsDeveloping community and key stakeholder relationshipsTake ownership of project timelines and deliverables, ensuring all marketing initiatives are executed on schedule and within budget constraintsConduct quality control measures to ensure all marketing materials and campaigns meet high standards of excellenceParticipate in regular brainstorming sessions with the team to deliver innovative ideas and solutionsProvide ongoing guidance and support to team members Regularly monitor project progress against established milestones and deliverables 
Skills:Excellent writing, presentation, and verbal communication skillsEnthusiastic, positive and proactive attitude toward accepting new challengesEagerness to learn and master various aspects of the marketing industryA proactive approach to problem-solving, with a focus on seeking solutionsExperience developing and managing budgets
Qualifications and experience:Bachelor’s degree Minimum of 3 years of experience in the marketing, community engagement, project management or related fieldMulticultural marketing experience is preferred but not required.Knowledge of Digital and Social Marketing is preferred but not required.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Marketing Manager
output_json.summary: Dynamic Marketing Manager needed for a Denver-based agency to lead strategic marketing campaigns.
